Name: Island Berry
About the game: When everyday reality causes nothing but boredom, and the passing days become similar to each other, then any of us begins to dream of something else. Be careful in your dreams, as the Island Berry is already calling for adventure! Island Berry is an immersive survival simulation game. At first, it may seem cute and harmless, but it is quite capable of challenging the player. The world of Island Berry is full of dangers and challenges that will help you improve your skills. And what are you going to do here? Well, actually there are a lot of things to do: Fishing Gardening Foraging, mining and crafting Fighting monsters Search for treasures, help mysterious locals and find your way home one day Good luck!
